column9: Q1L0|Does the company acknowledge climate change as a significant issue for the business?
column10: Q2L1|Does the company recognise climate change as a relevant risk and/or opportunity for the business?
column11: Q3L1|Does the company have a policy (or equivalent) commitment to action on climate change?
column12: Q4L2|Has the company set greenhouse gas emission reduction targets?
column13: Q5L2|Has the company published information on its Scope 1 and 2 greenhouse gas emissions?
column14: Q6L3|Has the company nominated a board member or board committee with explicit responsibility for oversight of the climate change policy?
column15: Q7L3|Has the company set quantitative targets for reducing its greenhouse gas emissions?
column16: Q8L3|Does the company report on Scope 3 emissions?
column17: Q9L3|Has the company had its operational (Scope 1 and/or 2) greenhouse gas emissions data verified?
column18: Q10L3|Does the company support domestic and international efforts to mitigate climate change?
column19: Q11L3|Does the company disclose its membership and involvement in trade associations engaged in climate issues?
column20: Q12L3|Does the company have a process to manage climate-related risks?
column21: Q13L3|Has the company set long-term quantitative targets for reducing its greenhouse gas emissions?
column22: Q14L4|Does the company's remuneration for senior executives incorporate climate change performance?
column23: Q15L4|Does the company incorporate climate change risks and opportunities in their strategy?
column24: Q16L4|Does the company incorporate climate change risks and opportunities in their strategy?
column25: Q17L4|Does the company disclose an internal price of carbon?
column26: Q18L4|Does the company disclose the actions necessary to meet its emissions-reduction targets?
column27: Q19L5|Does the company quantify the key elements of its emissions reduction strategy and the proportional impact of each action in achieving its targets?
column28: Q20L5|Does the company’s transition plan clarify the role that will be played by offsets and/or negative emissions technologies?
column29: Q21L5|Does the company commit to phasing out capital expenditure on carbon intensive assets or products?
column30: Q22L5|Does the company align future capital expenditures with its long-term decarbonisation goals and disclose how the alignment is determined?
column31: Q23L5|Does the company ensure consistency between its climate change policy and the positions taken by trade associations of which it is a member?
